desc.p: This file contains the override data for records that have already had their override approved. Further applications can then use this record to see if an override has already been applied to a transaction.
The ID of this file matches the ID of the transaction that created this entry.
This field is multi-valued & is associated to the APPLICATION field. It contains the T24 ID of the associated APPLICATION.
This field is updated each time the record is checked for OVERRIDE suppression.

This field is multi-valued & contains a list of applications that have accessed this record to check for OVERRIDE suppression. It is associated with the APP.ID field which details the T24 ID of the associated application.
This field is updated each time the record is checked for OVERRIDE suppression.

This field is multi-valued & contains the details of all the OVERRIDES that have been accepted in one of the applications listed in the APPLICATION field. (This must have been previously configured in each individual OVERRIDE message)
